titleStmt.title: A sermon preached at the publique fast the tenth day of May 1644. at St Maries Oxford, before the Members of the Honourable House of Commons there assembled. / By R. Chalfont B.D. and Fellow of Lincolne Coll. Printed by their order.
titleStmt.author: Chalfont, R. (Richard), 1607 or 8-1648.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Henry Hall fo[r] H. Curteyne,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: A fast sermon preached in Oxford.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
